conclusion: Violation of Art. 14+8;Remainder inadmissible;Non-pecuniary damage - finding of violation sufficient;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Respondent State to take measures of a general character
docname: CASE OF KONSTANTIN MARKIN v. RUSSIA
issue: Section 11 § 13 of the Military Service Act and the Regulations on Military Service ; Presidential decree No. 1237 of 16 September 1999
judges: Anatoly Kovler;Christos Rozakis;Dean Spielmann;Elisabeth Steiner;Khanlar Hajiyev;Sverre Erik Jebens
